data.title: David Y. Lee - Speaker
data.meta_description: David Is the Global Head of Sanctions and Screening at Payoneer. Before Payoneer, David was at Circle Internet Financial for two years as its Global Sanctions Officer, Director of Sanctions Compliance, and Secretary of the Risk & Compliance Specialized Risk Committee.
data.text: David Is the Global Head of Sanctions and Screening at Payoneer. Before Payoneer, David was at Circle Internet Financial for two years as its Global Sanctions Officer, Director of Sanctions Compliance, and Secretary of the Risk & Compliance Specialized Risk Committee. Before Circle, David spent nearly 20 years in the U.S. Government as a national security expert, where he most recently served in the State Department as Deputy Political Counselor at the United Nations Security Council focusing on sanctions. Before 2013, David spent nearly seven years at the White House National Security Council and Office of Management &Budget after beginning his career at the Commerce Department to focus on China export controls.
